Keywords: Assassin , Brotherhood of Mutants , Freedom Force , Quiet Council , Spy , X-Men
Real Name: Raven Darkholme
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
TARGETING: Adjacent
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.
LET ME SLIP INTO SOMETHING MORE COMFORTABLE: Stealth. // Mystique modifies defense +1 for each action token on adjacent opposing characters.
TOUGHER THAN I LOOK: Impervious, Super Senses, Willpower. Protected: Outwit.

September 3, 2021
Dortmuner
It's bowing to the needs of the Krakoan Revival mechanic. To make her capable of reviving 100 point characters, she has to be over 100 points.
September 3, 2021
jimmyboy
Doesn't feel like a Mystique dial. Also, 105 points? One, that's a very expensive Mystique. Two, are they going back to their old insane ways of nonsense point values?
August 13, 2021
pokolo
I get that she’s “tough” and shape change is benched but is she really as durable as Superman? I feel like they could have made the one exception here… wasn’t Willpower supposedly benched last set too? But they brought that back for her I’d rather she had Shape Change in place of impervious and been like 80/50 instead or whatever… 105 feels too much for her Also isn’t Mystique supposed to be a skilled hand-to-hand combatant? Nothing about this dial shows that aspect of her other than defensively… no CCE, Exploit, blades or flurry… this dial seems like it was designed for someone else then they put Mystique on it and added Krakoan Revival
August 12, 2021
Goop
She's alright, 105 is a lot of points now. You do get the outwit and some decent defense but thats really about it. Krakoa revival is still kinda sketchy if you want to use it or not. Better at her lower point line for sure but even then she just doesn't bring much other than outwit, incap and a lot of def.
June 5, 2021
saturnflight
Workaround: Mr. Sinister's Team-Up Card for Quiet Council gives Shape Change...
May 26, 2021
OutlawFH
Its really hard to see Shape Change "retired" when Mystique has been the figurehead of that power for so long. Powers and abilities are solid, no doubt but damn its not the same without seeing that blue in the DMG slot.
